duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide emergency care and treatment to patients in the ER, managing trauma and critical conditions.
Administer ACLS, PALS, and other necessary medical interventions as per certification and training.
Utilize BLS/BCLS and NRP techniques to stabilize patients and conduct neonatal resuscitation when needed.
Manage patient pain and comfort, and communicate with patients and their families to provide support and information.
Complete documentation, assessment, and reporting according to CPI, ENPC, and other nursing protocols and standards.
Assist in surgical and trauma procedures, and contribute to the care of patients undergoing surgery.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Nursing with active Hawaii License (Specialty Certifications: ACLS, PALS, ENPC, BLS/BCLS, NRP, CPI, RNFA, TNCC, AWHONN, NIHSS, STABLE, ASLS, NBSTSA, APHON, CMA, CCMA, RMA)
